chap2.search.maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • chap2.search.maze.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a search space as a 2D maze. The class Maze is used to record the data for a two-dimensional maze, including which grid locations contain walls or obstacles. From an abstract point of view a maze can be seen as a matrix with a certain amount of rows and columns.
    Author:
    Rambod Rahmani <rambodrahmani@autistici.org>
